reviews.text: My wife has stayed here in the past and highly recommended that we stay here as a family while passing through recently. I found the facility to be very modern and clean. Although we were here for only a few hours to crash and rest, everything about it supported that rest.
reviews.title: Modern, clean, restful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast in the morning was very good. A number of hot selections, cold selections, coffee, juices, etc. There is also Starbucks in the lobby for those who insist.
reviews.title: Clean & Comfortable

reviews.text: Wifi was free and reliable. The room was very clean and comfortable. Any hotel along the 183/820 corridor is going to suffer from the construction occuring, so until this part of the Fort Worth area finishes the work, plan on extra time to get lost given the ever-changing on/off ramps for the freeway.
reviews.title: lovely place to stay

reviews.text: I would consider staying here again.
reviews.title: Loved it! Would stay again!
Great hotel. Would recommend to all travelers.
reviews.text: We chose the Hyatt Place in Hurst as it was very close to a wedding we were attending. Our room was clean and quiet, and very spacious for our one-night stay.

The staff was fantastic and punctual, even the new employees. I'm a regular and the new faces are adding a bright and exciting enviroment. They tend to your every need! I LOVE THE HYATT PLACE and I will hopefully be back soon.
reviews.title: AMAZING SERVICE

reviews.text: Very nice hotel. Staff was extremely friendly. Tv was nice size which my husband enjoyed. Nice sleeper sofa for the kids to sleep on. Very impressed. Breakfast had pretty much anything you could want - huge selection. We will definitely be back.
reviews.title: Great place for families!!

reviews.text: We were guests of Nike for a couple of days and they put us up at the Hyatt in Hurst, TX. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Hyatt. Every staff member was friendly and helpful. Loved the room, with the separate seating area & desk. Although I really have no complaints and would stay here again if I were ever to come to the Fort Worth are, we had a hard time keeping a comfortable temperature in the room. The breakfast was set out in a appetizing manner, but the hot breakfast sandwiches were dried out and not very tasty. The first morning I poured myself a glass of tomato juice only to find out that it was fermented. Our checkout statement showed the room charge being more than I would usually pay, but after reading other posts it looks like a better price is available.
reviews.title: Good Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Loves this Hyatt Place. Convenient Location. Super clean and friendly service. Construction on 820 is a bummer but overall very good. Northeast Mall is super close and some great Tai food as well. No complaints whatsover. Great price as well.
reviews.title: Great Stay... Convenient Location

reviews.text: The Hyatt Place in Hurst was exceptional. Our entire family was in Hurst for a wedding. The rates were suited for everyone's purse. The service at the hotel was the best and the staff only wanted to please. The rooms were so comfortable, large and well appointed with all amenities. The lobby hosted a small friendly bar with ample comfortable seating around and 24 hour food available. The free breakfast was delicious. I don't think we could have asked for any better place to stay. From now on, in my travels, I will definitely look for another Hyatt Place.
reviews.title: Wonderful place to stay

reviews.text: This hotel is well located off of a major route in Texas. There are plenty of restaurants in the area.
reviews.title: Good hotel for business travel or short family stay
Great hotel ..... Great staff
reviews.text: The rooms are large with large comfortable sofa. There is a small fridge. They serve breakfast unfortunately they are not very accommodating if you need to leave before 6:00 am. The air conditioning/heating is a window unit and was noisy. The mattress was quite worn. There is a nice plasma tv and desk with free wi-fi. front desk staff was very friendly. The gym only has two treadmills. They were always busy. For under 100$ with breakfast it is a good deal, I wouldn't stay for any more.

Great hotel, great brand, great people, great food. My stay was wonderful. I attended a meeting and it was perfect. I really enjoyed the breakfast. The bar in the lobby and the availability of great food 24 hours a day made the stay wonderful
reviews.title: Good Hotel...Good Location

reviews.text: The hotel is about 10-15 minutes from DFW located right along side the major highway. I have stayed here in the past and once again I find it a very comfortable place lodge. The staff is very friendly and the breakfast is of Hyatt quality. The rooms are quiet and comfortable as well as clean.
reviews.title: Business Travel

reviews.text: I would recommend this hotel to anyone traveling in the area.
reviews.title: This is where I stay when visiting relatives in Hurst

reviews.text: Room was great, large and spacious, carpet had 2 spots on carpet of room 517, shuttle service to wedding-Mohamed was great driver, I used my charge card to pay for 1night stay ,and my daughter was paying for my second night. Hyatt started adding $10.00 a day for my card, and my daughter $20.00 a day. Instead of me being charge $92.00 for 1 night, I have charges of $205.32 on my debit card. What a mess.
reviews.title: Room great, charge card problems

reviews.text: The breakfast sandwiches were hot and fresh, egg, cheese and ham on english muffin, fresh fruit, oatmeal, cold cereals, milk, and juice. Great meal. Small lobby and dining area, sure got crowded when breakfast was going on.
reviews.title: Pleasantly stunned

reviews.text: After spending 1/2 the day at stranded at Dallas airport by American Airline. I was offered Hyatt Place as a choice for a overnight stay. I usually like to do my research however, I was exhausted, frustrated and just took a blind chance. The shuttle driver was hospitable (prior navy guy) and had lots of great conversation on the way from the airport. The front desk clerks were great and understood how distressed we were. The room was great, very spacious, great little sectional couch, refrigerator, desk, sink in the sitting area and sink outside the restroom, lots of closet space and comfy bed. It was like a spa after a traveling day from hell. The front desk staff cooked me up a tasty quesadilla and apple martini which was what I needed. The front desk staff even found some much needed toiletries since my luggage was MIA.
reviews.title: Nice Property

reviews.text: The only thing I can do is give this hotel the highest recommendation for a single, couple or family stay. I traveled solo this time but I will definitely be looking for this brand to travel with the family. The staff was great in the AM the breakfast was delicious and the shuttle driver whisked me back to the airport. Wish I could have spent more time here on better circumstances.
reviews.title: Great Hotel/Poor Execution of policy
Amazing
reviews.text: Stayed here to be close to relatives and the hotel is very nice. Nice rooms with big tv's and a typical hotel free breakfast in the morning. The room was very clean but had been visited by a smoker in the past. Enjoyed our stay and would stay here again.
